objects.text:
• Premium Denim Material
• Braided Leather Handles
• Matching Wristlet Included
• Shoulder Strap Design

product_details.name: Denim Tote Bag for Women Top Handle Satchel Purse Boho Shoulder Handbags with Wristlet
product_details.description: Package Dimensions: 14.88 x 11.42 x 2.91 inches; 2.27 Pounds. Department: Women. Country of Origin: China. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 113 ratings.

banner_details:
The banner design presents a modern and stylish promotional layout for a fashion accessory. The layout is divided into four distinct quadrants using diagonally intersecting rectangles, creating a dynamic split between two shades of blue (top) and two tones of warm brown (bottom). The top-left quadrant features a bold title text layer labeled `heading`, set in large, uppercase sans-serif font, followed by a sleeker `subheading` primarily for stylistic branding. Below the fold, the `description` text element presents the product highlights using bullet points, and the `price` text is displayed prominently in a bold font. A rectangular color-filled element (`cta_button`) contains the call-to-action text `cta`. On the right side, a large, realistic `product_image` of a denim and leather tote with a matching wristlet overlaps the quadrant divide for added contrast and focus. Subtle geometric decorations in white lines, dots, and circles underlay the background SVG, enriching the composition without overwhelming it.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue: `#233C7B`
- Steel Blue: `#4A6EA9`
- Indigo: `#3B5998`
- Burnt Orange: `#C67C4E`
- Saddle Brown: `#A66A40`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Cream: `#F8F4E3`
product_color: The product image features a stylish handbag and pouch set made of distressed denim and rich brown leather accents. The denim showcases a blend of medium to dark indigo shades with frayed textures that add depth and character. The brown leather components, including handles, trims, and patches, contrast beautifully with the denim, creating a sophisticated yet rugged aesthetic. For advertisement banners, a complementary color palette includes denim blue (#3E5A77), light washed blue (#A0C3D2), deep indigo (#233142), rich chestnut brown (#8C4B2F), and soft ivory (#F5F5F5) for balance. The overall color blend is both bold and earthy, highlighting the texture and craftsmanship.
